about_the_game:
Tactical outfit with fair price!

Included

  • Khaki Ghillie Suit set 1EA : Wear tactical ghillie suit!
  • Operation Document(100 Mission Point) 1EA : Enter into mission with additional Mission Points!
  • Amp-Device 1000EA : Amplify your attack power with special device!

name: Metal Reaper Online - Military Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT440
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
